pkg.name: file-upload
pkg.title: File upload
pkg.description: The File upload component allows users to attach multiple files to a form via drag-and-drop or by browsing the device.

scope.title: File upload
scope.description: The File upload component allows users to attach multiple files to a form via drag-and-drop or by browsing the device.

relatedComponents.name: file-input
relatedComponents.title: File input
relatedComponents.description: The File input component allows users to attach one file to a form field by browsing their device.
